function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of coordinated and inclusive global energy governance","Impact":"Potential failure to address decarbonization, leading to increased greenhouse gas emissions and environmental impact","Mitigation":"Establishment of coordinated global energy governance and inclusive policies that prioritize decarbonization","Technologies":"Policy frameworks, international agreements, and regulations for decarbonization","People":"Global population, future generations, and ecosystems","Owner":"Global and national policymakers"},{"Description":"Variability in green stimulus policies across countries","Impact":"Unequal progress in sustainable energy transitions, leading to discrepancies in emission reduction and environmental impact","Mitigation":"Encouraging and incentivizing countries to pursue green stimulus and sustainable energy transitions through international cooperation and funding mechanisms","Technologies":"Financial incentives, renewable energy technologies, and green infrastructure","People":"Global population, future generations, and ecosystems","Owner":"International organizations, national governments, and environmental advocates"},{"Description":"Exacerbated trends towards 're-shoring' and localization of energy systems","Impact":"Disruption of global supply chains, potential inefficiencies, and increased environmental impact from localized energy production","Mitigation":"Balancing re-shoring efforts with global cooperation, technology transfer, and efficiency improvements in localized energy production","Technologies":"Efficient localized energy systems, technology transfer programs, and global cooperation platforms","People":"Global population, future generations, and ecosystems","Owner":"International organizations, national governments, and energy industry stakeholders"}]}
